Um dos melhores jogos de mata mata de todos os tempos. Mais de 10 anos jogando Counter Strike me proporcionaram momentos únicos, muitos xingamentos (normal né),  muitos amigos e muito aprendizado. Quer relaxar, quer se estressar, quer ser 8 ou 80, Counter Strike é o jogo certo para você meu amigo. Nos vemos no campo de batalha!!!
The only name in competitive FPS
is good yes what ele you want to say
Buen juego, algunos hackers nomas, pero buen juego aklsdjlkas
adoro este jogo mas deviam melhorar o sistema anti cheats
53 hours i wasted on my life
We kill them, then we go home
this is a good game, i like it but without prime you find only hackers

Gameplay is very fun, quite competitive.  Just casual playing around in servers.  Fairly high skill gap, with some players having played the series for decades and know everything like the back of their hands.  Gets a thumbs up for being one of the great innovators of the genre.
It's cool game, give me award pls
Good game having a lot of fun in it but please nerf negev
This game is like drugs, you know they're bad for u but u can't stop using them..
Only gave me a mild crippling gambling addiction

Великая классика, но слишком однообразно. Много читеров, и valve ничего с этим не делает.
Слишком большая завязка на рефлексы.
außer die ganzen hacker die eh niemals gebannt werden, macht das Spiel eine menge Spaß
After 3k hours of play time I would say its fine.

An old game yet a bad one too.  I hate how they charged $15 for this game just to then make it free for other players.  The worst part is that there are hackers and cheaters in the servers making the game unfair.  honestly, this game just sucks but if you like competitive games this game might be for you.  But definitely not my type of game as the cheaters ruined my experience.
Jogo muuuito bom, porem poderia melhorar seu anti-cheat
Its Very Competitive so be warned
melhor game de todos os tempos, mas anda tendo muitos cheaters, um anti cheat mais eficiente seria ótimo
It's a very good game if u have prime.

Oyunda çok fazla hile var...
Biz artık oyunun sizi premium hesap satın almaya zorladığını düşünmeye başladık...
Hile açayımda free hesap kasarım hayallerine girmeyin, ban  yiyorsunuz ama bu oyunda ki hilenin kökünü kazıyamıyor...
Oyunda açıklar var ve çok yavaş düzeltiliyor diğer bir şey ise Fpsin sağlam bilgisayarlarda dahi arada drop girmesi.
kaç yıldır oynuyorum yeni hesaba geçtim, yıllardır source 2 güncellemesi ile kandırıp oyuncu alıp yine bir şekilde mezara gömüyorlar tek temenimiz hilelerin engellenmesi ancak source 2 de güzel oldurdu değil mi ?
